title: Large apartment with lots of storage and extra space
posting_body: Apartment has lots of space, at about 1000sf, spacious living room, a large kitchen, and a sunroom with skylights and large windows.
There is a full bathroom, and then an extra small 1/2 bath (toilet & sink) off the sunroom.
The kitchen includes a built-in microwave, gas range, dishwasher and garbage disposal, and lots of counter space.
Under-stairs closet, two bedroom closets, a separate walk-in closet, a bathroom closet, hallway closet, office closet, laundry closet, plus a small outdoor storage unit.

It includes in-unit washer & dryer, and a bunch of other small amenities, including USB outlets throughout, a Nest thermostat, a mail slot to keep your mail safe, a small garden with blooming trees in front, built-in storage and seating, and small shared outdoor patio.
All utilities provided (gas, electric, water, trash, sewer) except phone / cable / internet.
- Small dog or cat allowed for +$50/mo & adtl 50% deposit
- Application, credit, & copy of photo ID required from all over-18 applicants
Call / text / email with any questions

To apply, please provide application (no application fee) in person, or via mail or email for each adult over 18 years old, including signing section for credit check, along with copy of photo id and last two paystubs.
